name: Anycubic Kobra 3 firmwares
description: Official archived Anycubic Kobra 3 stock firmwares

firmwares.changes:
1. Fixed occasional Skip objects function bug
2. Fixed nozzle wiping error after flow calibration
3. Fixed video monitoring disconnect issue

1.Improve video stability
2.Improve video to 720P
3.Improve actions before printing
4.Improve cutting logic before Retraction

1. [Improve] File transfer stability
2. [New] Mono print pause with feed/retract
3. [New] Print score after completion

1.Fix bug of extrusion while pausing in printing
2.Fix bug from leveling error
3.Fix some text errors

1.Purge volume config. in ACS Next
2.Zone Leveling
3.More stable file transfers
*ACSNext >= 1.3.5

1.New: Adjustable AI detection sensitivity
2.New: Type-based filament mapping
3.New: support for cold bed tem
4.Fixed: Large file parsing failures
